pages.text: Firestone is one of the first to be melted from meteorite crystal. As a basic element, the masters of this element had a great connection to the keepers themselves.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: Flamethrower - allows the fire master to set a target on fire (if the battle is underwater, it can do serious damage to the enemy)$(br)Triple Fireball - the fire master fires three projectiles every second.$(br)Jet Flight - allows the firebender to temporarily fly into the air.$(br)$(br)Weapon: Fire Sword$(br)Passive ability: Invulnerable to fire, lava, etc.
